findings.issue: Document dated in the future (June 27, 2025) when current date is January 2025

findings.quote: Toby Ord gave at EAG London 2025
findings.issue: References a future event (EAG London 2025) as if it already occurred
Metaculus predictions change over time; these specific percentages may be outdated

errorDetails.raw:
[FINDING]
Category: factual_verification
Severity: major
Line: 194
Quote: "SU(5) is disproven because observational evidence indicates that the proton's half life is way longer than the theory predicts"
Issue: While SU(5) is ruled out, it's due to proton lifetime lower limits, not measured half-life
[/FINDING]
